doc:
Donald Stewart (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Stewart_(actor) 0 Donald Stewart (1910–1966) was an American actor and singer who settled and worked in the United Kingdom. After training at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts and several appearances in Broadway musicals (including Life Begins at 8:40), Stewart moved to England. He performed in revue, and became a leading man in several British films of the 1940s including The Peterville Diamond (1942) and One Exciting Night (1944). During the 1950s he appeared in character roles in films and increasingly on television. He was married to the actress Renée Houston, whom he met filming Fine Feathers (1937). Donald_Stewart ( 1910 – 1966 ) was an_American_actor and singer who settled and worked in the_United_Kingdom . After training at the_American_Academy of Dramatic_Arts and several_appearances in Broadway_musicals ( including_Life Begins at 8:40_) , Stewart moved to England . He performed in revue , and became a_leading_man in several_British_films of the_1940s including The_Peterville_Diamond_(_1942_) and One_Exciting_Night_(_1944_) . During the_1950s he appeared in character_roles in films and increasingly on television . He was_married to the_actress_Renée_Houston , whom he met_filming Fine_Feathers ( 1937_) .
